text: Brookhaven is a city in western DeKalb County, Georgia, United States. It is northeast of Atlanta. Brookhaven became DeKalb County's 11th city on December 17, 2012."CITY OF BROOKHAVEN: Request for Proposal (RFP) For Risk Management & Insurance Services For the City of Brookhaven, Georgia; Governor’s Commission on Brookhaven (“Commission”), December 3, 2012 It has been approved in a referendum on July 31, 2012. In 2020, 55,161 people live in Brookhaven. It is the largest city in DeKalb County."Brookhaven residents vote to create new city", Reporter Newspapers, July 31, 2012 The new city stretches over ."Georgia scraps over creation of new, mostly white cities " - USA Today 2012/07/30 ==References== ==Other websites== * City of Brookhaven * Brookhaven Directory * Brookhaven Neighborhood Association Category:2012 establishments in the United States Category:21st-century establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Cities in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Brookhaven, Georgia
